DOC.brief_title: ReNu™ Injection Treat Hip Osteoarthritis Study
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , non-randomized pilot study evaluate efficacy ReNu™ hip injection patient moderate osteoarthritis . The effect measure primarily patient-reported outcome questionnaire single injection . Patients follow 12 month evaluate improvement use common pain function subscales .
